name: Shell Gadus S2 OGXK
description: Low Temperature Open Gear and Wire Rope Grease

globalDocs.name: Gadus S2 OGXK EN TDG V1.3 28-Jun-2021

Gadus S2 OGXK Canada FR 140006579500 EHS V1.2 24-APR-2021

marketing:
Shell Gadus S2 OGXK is primarily designed for use in severe cold-weather conditions, in mining equipment, shovels, draglines and excavators in open cut operations. 
Shell Gadus S2 OGT is based on Aluminium Complex soap thickener with medium and high viscosity mineral base oil containing enhanced extreme pressure and antiwear chemistry. Diluent is used to ensure low-temperature pumpability.
